alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 2:15PM CST until January 08 at 5:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 4 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 4 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and outdoor decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds combined with snow Sunday night may create areas of lower visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
